channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A single-engine plane crashes near a Pennsylvania airport and all 5 aboard are taken to hospitals
item.description: A single-engine airplane with five people on board crashed and burst into flames in a parking lot near a small airport in suburban Pennsylvania.

item.title: North Korea tests 'multiple' ballistic missiles as US-South Korea war games begin
item.description: "South Korean military has increased surveillance and maintaining readiness posture in close cooperation with the U.S.," South Korea's Joint Chiefs sa...

item.title: What to know about March's full "Blood Worm Moon," a total lunar eclipse
item.description: Viewers across North America will get to enjoy a full Blood Worm Moon during a total lunar eclipse on March 13 into March 14.

item.title: 3/9/2025: Firing the Watchdogs; The Settlement; A Method to this Madness
item.description: First, a report on the significance of President Trump firing independent government watchdogs. Then, a look inside the Purdue Pharma bankruptcy case....

item.title: North Korea fires ballistic missiles after U.S., South start annual drills
item.description: North Korea fired several ballistic missiles into the sea after South Korean and U.S. troops began their large annual combined drills, Seoul said.

item.title: Kid Rock Says He’s Bringing This Infamous Trump-Hater To The White House To ‘Unite The Country’

item.description: Tuesday's talks in Riyadh are intended to revitalize bilateral relations following weeks of tense exchanges between Washington, D.C., and Kyiv.

item.title: Bernie Sanders steps into leadership of the anti-Trump resistance
item.description: At 83 years old, Bernie Sanders has emerged as an unlikely leader of the Democratic resistance to Donald Trump

item.title: WATCH: Dog finds home after 1,739 days in shelter
item.description: Brittany Bunnell adopted Jones, a 13-year-old dog that spent almost five years in a shelter and became a staff favorite.
